elements.label: A Troublemaker
elements.description: Someone who's lost all sense of proportion.

elements.label: Auclair, a troublemaker
elements.description: Auclair enjoys chess, now more than ever. The black, the white.

elements.label: Cat Caro, a troublemaker
elements.description: 'Cat Caro', she calls herself. Once she was a fortune teller. No-one seems to know exactly what she is now.

elements.label: 'Pope' Clifton, a troublemaker
elements.description: Clifton likes to be addressed as 'your Holiness'. When he is not so addressed, there may be a scene.

elements.label: Clovette, a troublemaker
elements.description: It's difficult to dislike Clovette, even when one knows what she's done.

elements.label: Dorothy, a troublemaker
elements.description: Dorothy will not cease. She will never cease. She has vowed as much.

elements.label: Douglas, a troublemaker
elements.description: Douglas isn't having any more of it. Time to see what all the fuss is about.

elements.label: Elridge, a troublemaker
elements.description: Elridge's shoes are often spotted with blood.

elements.label: Enid, a troublemaker
elements.description: Enid always sees her enemies coming. All the time.

elements.label: Laidlaw, a troublemaker
elements.description: Laidlaw's schemes are intricate as fern-shadow.

elements.label: Leo, a troublemaker
elements.description: Leo has chosen his cause, and he will do what is necessary to preserve it.

elements.label: Neville, a troublemaker
elements.description: Neville knows this can't last. But while it does, by God, he will open whatever doors present themselves.

elements.label: Porter, a troublemaker
elements.description: Porter has begun to collect names.

elements.label: Renira, a troublemaker
elements.description: Renira likes to convert admirers into worshippers.

elements.label: Rose, a troublemaker
elements.description: Rose has long since ceased to fear her enemies.

elements.label: Saliba, a troublemaker
elements.description: Saliba does not tolerate boredom.

elements.label: Slee, a troublemaker
elements.description: Slee is always hungry for resources to pursue his theories.

elements.label: Sylvia, a troublemaker
elements.description: Sylvia's agenda is not clear. One suspects it is not clear even to Sylvia.

elements.label: Tristan, a troublemaker
elements.description: Tristan is forging a little kingdom. When fire is necessary, he will use fire.

elements.label: Valciane, a troublemaker
elements.description: Valciane attends to her opposition with the remorseless brio of a youth smashing bottles.

elements.label: Victor, a troublemaker
elements.description: Victor is ready for what may come. All his knives are keen as new soldiers.

elements.label: Violet, a troublemaker
elements.description: Violet has found new hobbies.

elements.label: Ysabet, a troublemaker
elements.description: Ysabet waits where she cannot be seen.

elements.label: A Rival

elements.label: Connie, a renegade
elements.description: Connie's... Connie's thinking things over.

elements.label: Natalia, a renegade
elements.description: Natalia has learnt truths that were too long hidden. In consequence, she has adjusted her agenda.

elements.label: Slee, a rival
elements.description: Slee is always hungry for resources to pursue his theories.

elements.label: Spencer, a renegade
elements.description: For so long, Spencer flirted with these possibilities... and now he's made his decision.

elements.label: Sylvia, a rival
elements.description: Sylvia's agenda is not clear. One suspects it is not clear even to Sylvia.

elements.label: Tristan, a rival
elements.description: Tristan is forging a little kingdom. When fire is necessary, he will use fire.

elements.label: Violet, a rival
elements.description: Violet has found new hobbies.

elements.label: Ysabet, a rival
elements.description: Ysabet waits where she cannot be seen.

elements.label: Zachary, a renegade
elements.description: Zachary has always followed his reasoning wherever it leads: and now, it has led him out of the Suppression Bureau, into a bitter dawn.
